title: The World at Work: Digital Nomads
text:
The World at Work: Digital Nomads 6:02am EDT - 03:23
With job openings at an all-time high, a growing of number of companies are allowing their employees to work remotely - spurring new co-living and co-working habitats around the globe to accommodate the generation of 'digital nomads' whose wanderlust is tempered only by the need for strong WiFi.
